title: Soooo the Battlecast poro ward...?
body:
I was pretty sure that the battlecast (and dragon slayer) poro wards were supposed to be a part of Snowdown.  Obviously that didn’t happen, that’s fine, plans change,  its more than a little weird though that there was never an announcement about the delay/removal of the wards from Snowdown nor has there been a new release date or eta for the missing wards. Now I’m sitting here with my battlecast skarner skin, my battlecast poro icon… and no battlecast poro ward.   
An update would be appreciated!

replies.body: The Battlecast and Dragonslayer poro wards will still be coming out! (Unfortunately, I don't have an exact date for you. D:)
YOu liar ;-; The battlecast poro ward just came out an hour ago. I know you knew it was coming out ;-;
I actually didn't know for this one, haha.
But i thought you were like in charge of anything that had to do with visuals and such ;-;
I'm on the skins team, but I don't always know the release date of stuff.
The battlecast Poro ward is now available in store :)
